description: A flaw has been found in Chanjet TPlus up to 20251121. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /tplus/ajaxpro/Ufida.T.SM.UIP.MultiCompanySettingController,Ufida.T.SM.UIP.ashx?method=Load. This manipulation of the argument currentAccId causes sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been published and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
